long_description: Bringing snowplow know-how to your littler skier, the Lucky Bums Falline Easy Wedge helps young beginners master the art of turning and speed control. Easy Wedge makes turning easier by connecting the ski tips, helping the skier maintain the correct wedge position while moving down the slopes with control. Installation is simple: just slide the jaw clamps over the ski tips and tighten the screws.
short_description: Bringing snowplow know-how to your littler skier, the Lucky Bums Falline Easy Wedge helps young beginners master the art of turning and speed control.
